unnormalised: Hey everyone, just wanted to ask a question about festival dates in India. It's always a bit confusing trying to keep track of when everything is!
normalised: Hey everyone, just wanted to ask a question about festival dates in India. It's always a bit confusing trying to keep track of when everything is!

unnormalised: So, like, when exactly is Diwali this year? My mom said it's on 11/12/2024 but my calendar app shows a different date. I usually prepone all my travel plans well in advance. Any ideas?
normalised: So, like, when exactly is Diwali this year? My mom said it's on eleventh December two thousand and twenty four but my calendar app shows a different date. I usually prepone all my travel plans well in advance. Any ideas?

unnormalised: And what about Holi? Is it in March like always? I think last year it was on 08/03/2023, something like that. I want to book my train tix back home to Delhi, but I don't want to book them for the wrong day!
normalised: And what about Holi? Is it in March like always? I think last year it was on eighth March two thousand and twenty three, something like that. I want to book my train tickets back home to Delhi, but I don't want to book them for the wrong day!

unnormalised: Also, I was trying to remember when Durga Puja starts. I know it's usually around September-October, but can anyone give me the precise dates for 2024? I'm planning a trip to Kolkata and want to catch the festivities. I believe that its around the 1st of October.
normalised: Also, I was trying to remember when Durga Puja starts. I know it's usually around September-October, but can anyone give me the precise dates for two thousand and twenty four? I'm planning a trip to Kolkata and want to catch the festivities. I believe that its around the first of October.

unnormalised: Sometimes it feels like these dates change every year, or maybe it's just me forgetting! Any help would be great!
normalised: Sometimes it feels like these dates change every year, or maybe it's just me forgetting! Any help would be great!

unnormalised: And what’s the deal with Eid al-Fitr? It’s tied to the lunar calendar, right? So the date keeps shifting. Any predictions for when it’ll fall in 2024? I need to book my tickets to meet my family around 25/06/2024.
normalised: And what’s the deal with Eid al-Fitr? It’s tied to the lunar calendar, right? So the date keeps shifting. Any predictions for when it’ll fall in two thousand and twenty four? I need to book my tickets to meet my family around twenty fifth June two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: Maybe someone can create a yearly calendar with all the dates marked! Would make life much simpler. Thanks a ton in advance! I hope to hear back around 6:30 PM today. Cheers!
normalised: Maybe someone can create a yearly calendar with all the dates marked! Would make life much simpler. Thanks a ton in advance! I hope to hear back around six thirty P-M today. Cheers!
